QuestData.Title: The Final Step
QuestData.Description: It's time to fight fire with fire.$B$BWe have Morkurk cornered. His protections gone. Use the scroll once you engage Morkurk...$B$B...and enjoy the fireworks.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Witch Lord Morkurk and retrieve the Arcane Nexus in Gordal Fortress.
QuestData.RewardText: That's what we were after.$B$BLet's get out of here!
